00042 QVariant BusPortsModel::data( const QModelIndex& index, 
00043                                                          int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole*/ ) const {
00044 
00045         if (!index.isValid())
00046                 return QVariant();
00047         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00048                 return QVariant();
00049 
00050         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00051 
00052                 switch (index.column()) {
00053                 case 0: {
00054                         return table_.at(index.row()).name_;
00055                                 }
00056                 case 1: {
00057                         return portQualifier2Str(table_.at(index.row()).qualifier_);
00058                                 }
00059                 case 2: {
00060                         return table_.at(index.row()).width_;
00061                                 }
00062                 case 3: {
00063                         return table_.at(index.row()).defaultValue_;
00064                                 }
00065                 case 4: {
00066                         return portMode2Str(table_.at(index.row()).mode_);
00067                                 }
00068                 case 5: {
00069                         return portDirection2Str(table_.at(index.row()).direction_);
00070                                 }
00071                 case 6: {
00072                         return General::presence2Str(table_.at(index.row()).presence_);
00073                                 }
00074                 case 7: {
00075                         return portDriver2Str(table_.at(index.row()).driver_);
00076                                 }
00077                 case 8: {
00078                         return table_.at(index.row()).comment_;
00079                                 }
00080                 default: {
00081                         return QVariant();
00082                                         }
00083                 }
00084         }
00085         else if (role == Qt::BackgroundRole) {
00086                 int topIndex = index.row();
00087 
00088                 // find the index that is the first index for this port
00089                 while (topIndex > 0 && topIndex < table_.size()) {
00090 
00091                         // if the next port is different port
00092                         if (table_.at(topIndex - 1).name_ != table_.at(index.row()).name_)
00093                                 break;
00094                         
00095                         // if the next port is the same port
00096                         else
00097                                 --topIndex;
00098                 }
00099 
00100                 // the first item has white back ground
00101                 if (topIndex == 0)
00102                         return QColor("white");
00103 
00104                 // index for the previous port
00105                 QModelIndex previous = QAbstractTableModel::index(--topIndex, 0, QModelIndex());
00106 
00107                 // color of the previous port
00108                 QColor previousColor = data(previous, Qt::BackgroundRole).value<QColor>();
00109 
00110                 // return a color that is different from previous port
00111                 if (previousColor == QColor("white"))
00112                         return QColor("lightgrey");
00113                 else
00114                         return QColor("white");
00115         }
00116 
00117         else
00118                 return QVariant();
00119 }

00121 QVariant BusPortsModel::headerData( int section,
00122                                                                    Qt::Orientation orientation,
00123                                                                    int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole*/ ) const {
00124 
00125    if (role != Qt::DisplayRole)
00126            return QVariant();
00127    else if (section < 0)
00128            return QVariant();
00129 
00130    if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00131            if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal) {
00132 
00133                    switch (section) {
00134                    case 0: {
00135                            return tr("Name");
00136                                    }
00137                    case 1: {
00138                            return tr("Qualifier");
00139                                    }
00140                    case 2: {
00141                            return tr("Width");
00142                                    }
00143                    case 3: {
00144                            return tr("Default");
00145                                    }
00146                    case 4: {
00147                            return tr("Mode");
00148                                    }
00149                    case 5: {
00150                            return tr("Direction");
00151                                    }
00152                    case 6: {
00153                            return tr("Presence");
00154                                    }
00155                    case 7: {
00156                            return tr("Driver");
00157                                    }
00158                    case 8: {
00159                            return tr("Comment");
00160                                    }
00161                    default: {
00162                            return QVariant();
00163                                         }
00164                    }
00165            }
00166            // vertical headers
00167            else {
00168 
00169                    // provide horizontal headers only for each defined port
00170                    if (section > table_.size())
00171                            return QVariant();
00172 
00173                    return section + 1;
00174            }
00175    }
00176    // if unsupported role
00177    else
00178            return QVariant();
00179 }

00181 QString BusPortsModel::portMode2Str( PortMode mode ) const {
00182         switch (mode) {
00183                 case BusPortsModel::MODE_MASTER: 
00184                         return tr("master");
00185                 case BusPortsModel::MODE_SLAVE: 
00186                         return tr("slave");
00187                 case BusPortsModel::MODE_SYSTEM:
00188                         return tr("system");
00189                 case  BusPortsModel::MODE_ANY:
00190                         return tr("any");
00191                 default:
00192                         return QString();
00193         }
00194 }

00196 BusPortsModel::PortMode BusPortsModel::str2PortMode( const QString& str ) const {
00197 
00198         if (str == QString("master"))
00199                 return BusPortsModel::MODE_MASTER;
00200         else if (str == QString("slave"))
00201                 return BusPortsModel::MODE_SLAVE;
00202         else if (str == QString("system"))
00203                 return BusPortsModel::MODE_SYSTEM;
00204         else
00205                 return BusPortsModel::MODE_ANY;
00206 }

00292 void BusPortsModel::save() {
00293 
00294         // remove previous ports
00295         ports_->clear();
00296 
00297         for (int i = 0; i < table_.size(); ++i) {
00298 
00299                 // do not add ports with empty name
00300                 if (table_.at(i).name_.isEmpty())
00301                         continue;
00302 
00303                 QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> portAbs = QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction>(
00304                         new PortAbstraction());
00305 
00306                 // set the logical name
00307                 portAbs->setLogicalName(table_.at(i).name_);
00308 
00309                 // set the qualifier for the port
00310                 switch (table_.at(i).qualifier_) {
00311                         case BusPortsModel::QUALIFIER_ADDRESS: {
00312                                 portAbs->setAsAddress();
00313                                 break;
00314                                                                                                    }
00315                         case BusPortsModel::QUALIFIER_DATA: {
00316                                 portAbs->setAsData();
00317                                 break;
00318                                                                                                    }
00319                         case BusPortsModel::QUALIFIER_CLOCK: {
00320                                 portAbs->setAsClock();
00321                                 break;
00322                                                                                                    }
00323                         case BusPortsModel::QUALIFIER_RESET: {
00324                                 portAbs->setAsReset();
00325                                 break;
00326                                                                                                    }
00327                          // qualifier is any
00328                         default: {
00329                                 portAbs->clearQualifier();
00330                                 break;
00331                                          }
00332 
00333                 }
00334 
00335                 // set the default value element
00336                 if (!table_.at(i).defaultValue_.isEmpty()) {
00337                         portAbs->setDefaultValue(table_.at(i).defaultValue_.toInt());
00338                 }
00339 
00340                 // set the driver settings for the port
00341                 switch (table_.at(i).driver_) {
00342                         case BusPortsModel::DRIVER_ANY: {
00343                                 portAbs->setDriverType(General::ANY);
00344                                 break;
00345                                                                                         }
00346                         case BusPortsModel::DRIVER_CLOCK: {
00347                                 portAbs->setDriverType(General::CLOCK);
00348                                 break;
00349                                                                                           }
00350                         case BusPortsModel::DRIVER_SINGLESHOT: {
00351                                 portAbs->setDriverType(General::SINGLESHOT);
00352                                 break;
00353                                                                                                    }
00354                         // BusPortsModel::DRIVER_NONE
00355                         default: {
00356                                 portAbs->setRequiresDriver(false);
00357                                          }
00358                 }
00359 
00360                 // save the current port
00361                 savePort(portAbs, i);
00362 
00363                 // while there are ports defined for same port abstraction but with 
00364                 // different modes
00365                 while (i < table_.size()-1 && table_.at(i + 1).name_ == table_.at(i).name_) {
00366                         ++i;
00367                         savePort(portAbs, i);
00368                 }
00369 
00370                 // set the description for the port
00371                 portAbs->setDescription(table_.at(i).comment_);
00372 
00373                 // append the created port to the list
00374                 ports_->append(portAbs);
00375         }
00376 }
00377 
00378 void BusPortsModel::savePort(QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> portAbs, int i) {
00379         // set the width of the port for the specified element
00380         switch (table_.at(i).mode_) {
00381                         case BusPortsModel::MODE_MASTER: {
00382                                 portAbs->setMasterWidth(table_.at(i).width_);
00383                                 break;
00384                                                                                          }
00385                         case BusPortsModel::MODE_SLAVE: {
00386                                 portAbs->setSlaveWidth(table_.at(i).width_);
00387                                 break;
00388                                                                                         }
00389                         case BusPortsModel::MODE_SYSTEM: {
00390                                 portAbs->setSystemWidth(table_.at(i).width_);
00391                                 break;
00392                                                                                          }
00393                         // MODE_ANY
00394                         default: {
00395                                 portAbs->setAllWidths(table_.at(i).width_);
00396                                 break;
00397                                          }
00398         }
00399 
00400         // set the direction of the port for the specified element
00401         switch (table_.at(i).mode_) {
00402                         case BusPortsModel::MODE_MASTER: {
00403                                 portAbs->setMasterDirection(portDirection2Direction(table_.at(i).direction_));
00404                                 break;
00405                                                                                          }
00406                         case BusPortsModel::MODE_SLAVE: {
00407                                 portAbs->setSlaveDirection(portDirection2Direction(table_.at(i).direction_));
00408                                 break;
00409                                                                                         }
00410                         case BusPortsModel::MODE_SYSTEM: {
00411                                 portAbs->setSystemDirection(portDirection2Direction(table_.at(i).direction_));
00412                                 break;
00413                                                                                          }
00414                         // MODE_ANY
00415                         default: {
00416                                 portAbs->setAllDirections(portDirection2Direction(table_.at(i).direction_));
00417                                 break;
00418                                          }
00419         }
00420 
00421         // set the presence for the specified element
00422         switch (table_.at(i).mode_) {
00423                         case BusPortsModel::MODE_MASTER: {
00424                                 portAbs->setMasterPresence(table_.at(i).presence_);
00425                                 break;
00426                                                                                          }
00427                         case BusPortsModel::MODE_SLAVE: {
00428                                 portAbs->setSlavePresence(table_.at(i).presence_);
00429                                 break;
00430                                                                                         }
00431                         case BusPortsModel::MODE_SYSTEM: {
00432                                 portAbs->setSystemPresence(table_.at(i).presence_);
00433                                 break;
00434                                                                                          }
00435                         // MODE_ANY
00436                         default: {
00437                                 portAbs->setAllPresences(table_.at(i).presence_);
00438                                 break;
00439                                          }
00440         }
00441 }
00442 
00443 void BusPortsModel::readPorts() {
00444 
00445         beginResetModel();
00446         for (int i = 0; i < ports_->size(); ++i) {
00447                 QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> portAbs = ports_->at(i);
00448                 if (!portAbs)
00449                         continue;
00450 
00451                 // create port for master
00452                 if (portAbs->hasMaster()) {
00453                         readPort(portAbs, portAbs->getMaster(), BusPortsModel::MODE_MASTER);
00454                 }
00455 
00456                 // create port for slave
00457                 if (portAbs->hasSlave()) {
00458                         readPort(portAbs, portAbs->getSlave(), BusPortsModel::MODE_SLAVE);
00459                 }
00460 
00461                 // create port for system
00462                 if (portAbs->hasSystem()) {
00463                         readPort(portAbs, portAbs->getSystem(), BusPortsModel::MODE_SYSTEM);
00464                 }
00465         }
00466 
00467         // sort the table
00468         qSort(table_);
00469 
00470         endResetModel();
00471 }
00472 
00473 void BusPortsModel::readPort( QSharedPointer<PortAbstraction> portAbs, 
00474                                                          WireAbstraction::WirePort* modeSpesific,
00475                                                          BusPortsModel::PortMode mode) {
00476 
00477         Q_ASSERT_X(portAbs, "BusPortsModel::readPort",
00478                 "Null Port Abstraction pointer given as parameter");
00479         Q_ASSERT_X(modeSpesific, "BusPortsModel::readPort",
00480                 "Null WirePort pointer given as parameter");
00481 
00482         BusPortsModel::Port port(portAbs->getLogicalName());
00483 
00484         // set the qualifier
00485         if (portAbs->isAddress())
00486                 port.qualifier_ = BusPortsModel::QUALIFIER_ADDRESS;
00487         else if (portAbs->isData())
00488                 port.qualifier_ = BusPortsModel::QUALIFIER_DATA;
00489         else if (portAbs->isClock())
00490                 port.qualifier_ = BusPortsModel::QUALIFIER_CLOCK;
00491         else if (portAbs->isReset())
00492                 port.qualifier_ = BusPortsModel::QUALIFIER_RESET;
00493         else
00494                 port.qualifier_ = BusPortsModel::QUALIFIER_ANY;
00495 
00496         // set the width
00497         port.width_ = modeSpesific->width_;
00498 
00499         // if default value has not been defined
00500         if (portAbs->getDefaultValue() < 0)
00501                 port.defaultValue_ = QString();
00502         else
00503                 port.defaultValue_ = QString::number(portAbs->getDefaultValue());
00504 
00505         // set the mode
00506         port.mode_ = mode;
00507 
00508         // set the direction of the port
00509         switch (modeSpesific->direction_) {
00510                 case General::IN: {
00511                         port.direction_ = BusPortsModel::DIRECTION_IN;
00512                         break;
00513                                                   }
00514                 case General::OUT: {
00515                         port.direction_ = BusPortsModel::DIRECTION_OUT;
00516                         break;
00517                                                    }
00518                 default: {
00519                         port.direction_ = BusPortsModel::DIRECTION_INOUT;
00520                         break;
00521                                  }
00522         }
00523 
00524         // set the presence for the port
00525         port.presence_ = modeSpesific->presence_;
00526 
00527         // set the driver setting for the port
00528 
00529         // if port does not require driver
00530         if (!portAbs->getRequiresDriver()) 
00531                 port.driver_ = BusPortsModel::DRIVER_NONE;
00532         
00533         // if driver is needed then find out it's type
00534         else {
00535                 switch (portAbs->getDriverType()) {
00536                         case General::CLOCK: {
00537                                 port.driver_ = BusPortsModel::DRIVER_CLOCK;
00538                                 break;
00539                                                                  }
00540                         case General::SINGLESHOT: {
00541                                 port.driver_ = BusPortsModel::DRIVER_SINGLESHOT;
00542                                 break;
00543                                                                           }
00544                         default: {
00545                                 port.driver_ = BusPortsModel::DRIVER_ANY;
00546                                 break;
00547                                          }
00548                 }
00549         }
00550 
00551         port.comment_ = portAbs->getDescription();
00552         table_.append(port);
00553 }

00555 void BusPortsModel::addSignal() {
00556 
00557         BusPortsModel::Port port;
00558 
00559         beginInsertRows(QModelIndex(), table_.size(), table_.size());
00560         table_.prepend(port);
00561         endInsertRows();
00562 
00563         emit contentChanged();
00564 }
00565 
00566 void BusPortsModel::addSignalOptions(const QModelIndexList& indexes ) {
00567         QList<BusPortsModel::Port> ports;
00568 
00569         // find all ports that match given indexes
00570         foreach (QModelIndex index, indexes) {
00571 
00572                 if (index.row() >= 0 && index.row() <= table_.size()) {
00573 
00574                         // find the port for the index
00575                         BusPortsModel::Port temp = table_.at(index.row());
00576 
00577                         // if port is not yet added to the list
00578                         if (!ports.contains(temp))
00579                                 ports.append(temp);
00580                 }
00581         }
00582 
00583         beginResetModel();
00584 
00585         // make other port modes for the port
00586         foreach (BusPortsModel::Port port, ports) {
00587 
00588                 // make copies of the port with different modes
00589                 BusPortsModel::Port master(port);
00590                 master.mode_ = BusPortsModel::MODE_MASTER;
00591                 BusPortsModel::Port slave(port);
00592                 slave.mode_ = BusPortsModel::MODE_SLAVE;
00593                 BusPortsModel::Port system(port);
00594                 system.mode_ = BusPortsModel::MODE_SYSTEM;
00595 
00596                 // remove the original port to avoid duplicates
00597                 int index = table_.indexOf(port);
00598                 table_.removeAt(index);
00599 
00600                 // add the ports that are not already in the table
00601                 if (!table_.contains(master))
00602                         table_.append(master);
00603                 if (!table_.contains(slave))
00604                         table_.append(slave);
00605                 if (!table_.contains(system))
00606                         table_.append(system);
00607         }
00608 
00609         // sort the table to keep ports in order
00610         qSort(table_);
00611 
00612         endResetModel();
00613 
00614         emit contentChanged();
00615 }
00616 
00617 bool BusPortsModel::setData(const QModelIndex& index, 
00618                                                         const QVariant& value, 
00619                                                         int role /*= Qt::EditRole*/) {
00620 
00621         if (!index.isValid())
00622                 return false;
00623         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00624                 return false;
00625 
00626         if (role == Qt::EditRole) {
00627 
00628                 switch (index.column()) {
00629                         case 0: {
00630                                 
00631                                 // make sure there is not already port with same name and mode
00632                                 BusPortsModel::Port temp = table_.at(index.row());
00633                                 temp.name_ = value.toString();
00634                                 if (table_.contains(temp))
00635                                         return false;
00636 
00637                                 // don't rename all empty signal names if renaming was done for
00638                                 // empty port name
00639                                 if (table_.at(index.row()).name_.isEmpty()) {
00640                                         table_[index.row()].name_ = value.toString();
00641                                         emit dataChanged(index, index);
00642                                         return true;
00643                                 }
00644 
00645                                 renamePort(table_.at(index.row()).name_, value.toString());
00646                                 return true;
00647                                         }
00648                         case 1: {
00649                                 setQualifier(table_.at(index.row()).name_, value.toString());
00650                                 return true;
00651                                         }
00652                         case 2: {
00653                                 table_[index.row()].width_ = value.toInt();
00654                                 emit dataChanged(index, index);
00655                                 return true;
00656                                         }
00657                         case 3: {
00658                                 setDefaultValue(table_.at(index.row()).name_, value.toString());
00659                                 return true;
00660                                         }
00661                         case 4: {
00662                                 table_[index.row()].mode_ = str2PortMode(value.toString());
00663                                 emit dataChanged(index, index);
00664                                 return true;
00665                                         }
00666                         case 5: {
00667                                 table_[index.row()].direction_ = str2PortDirection(value.toString());
00668                                 emit dataChanged(index, index);
00669                                 return true;
00670                                         }
00671                         case 6: {
00672                                 table_[index.row()].presence_ = General::str2Presence(value.toString(), General::REQUIRED);
00673                                 emit dataChanged(index, index);
00674                                 return true;
00675                                         }
00676                         case 7: {
00677                                 setDriver(table_.at(index.row()).name_, value.toString());
00678                                 return true;
00679                                         }
00680                         case 8: {
00681                                 setComment(table_.at(index.row()).name_, value.toString());
00682                                 return true;
00683                                         }
00684                         default: {
00685                                 return false;
00686                                          }
00687                 }
00688 
00689                 
00690         }
00691         // unsupported role
00692         else
00693                 return false;
00694 }
00695 
00696 Qt::ItemFlags BusPortsModel::flags(const QModelIndex& index) const {
00697 
00698         if (!index.isValid())
00699                 return Qt::NoItemFlags;
00700         return Qt::ItemIsEditable | Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable;
00701 }
00702 
00703 void BusPortsModel::renamePort( const QString oldPort, const QString newPort ) {
00704 
00705         // change all ports with given name
00706         for (int i = 0; i < table_.size(); ++i) {
00707 
00708                 if (table_.at(i).name_ == oldPort) {
00709                         table_[i].name_ = newPort;
00710                         QModelIndex ind = index(i, 0, QModelIndex());
00711                         emit dataChanged(ind, ind);
00712                 }
00713         }
00714 
00715         // sort the model to keep it ordered
00716         beginResetModel();
00717         qSort(table_);
00718         endResetModel();
00719 }

00721 void BusPortsModel::setQualifier( const QString& portName, const QString& qualifier ) {
00722 
00723         // change all qualifiers that have the given port name
00724         for (int i = 0; i < table_.size(); ++i) {
00725 
00726                 if (table_.at(i).name_ == portName) {
00727                         table_[i].qualifier_ = str2PortQualifier(qualifier);
00728                         QModelIndex ind = index(i, 1, QModelIndex());
00729                         emit dataChanged(ind, ind);
00730                 }
00731         }
00732 }

00734 void BusPortsModel::setDefaultValue( const QString& portName, const QString& defaultValue ) {
00735 
00736         // change all default values for given ports
00737         for (int i = 0; i < table_.size(); ++i) {
00738 
00739                 if (table_.at(i).name_ == portName) {
00740                         table_[i].defaultValue_ = defaultValue;
00741                         QModelIndex ind = index(i, 3, QModelIndex());
00742                         emit dataChanged(ind, ind);
00743 
00744                         // default value and driver are mutually exclusive
00745                         table_[i].driver_ = BusPortsModel::DRIVER_NONE;
00746                         QModelIndex ind2 = index(i, 7, QModelIndex());
00747                         emit dataChanged(ind2, ind2);
00748                 }
00749         }
00750 }

00752 void BusPortsModel::setDriver(const QString& portName, const QString& driverValue) {

00757                 if (table_.at(i).name_ == portName) {
00758                         table_[i].driver_ = str2PortDriver(driverValue);
00759                         QModelIndex ind = index(i, 7, QModelIndex());
00760                         emit dataChanged(ind, ind);

00762                         // default value and driver are mutually exclusive
00763                         table_[i].defaultValue_ = QString();
00764                         QModelIndex ind2 = index(i, 3, QModelIndex());
00765                         emit dataChanged(ind2, ind2);
00766                 }
00767         }

00795 General::Direction BusPortsModel::portDirection2Direction( PortDirection direction ) const {
00796         switch (direction) {
00797                 case BusPortsModel::DIRECTION_IN: {
00798                         return General::IN;
00799                                                                                   }
00800                 case BusPortsModel::DIRECTION_OUT: {
00801                         return General::OUT;
00802                                                                                    }
00803                 // BusPortsModel::DIRENTION:INOUT
00804                 default: {
00805                         return General::INOUT;
00806                                  }
00807         }
00808 }
00809 
00810 void BusPortsModel::removeIndexes(const QModelIndexList& indexes ) {
00811 
00812         QList<BusPortsModel::Port> ports;
00813 
00814         // find all ports that match given indexes
00815         foreach (QModelIndex index, indexes) {
00816                 
00817                 if (index.row() >= 0 && index.row() <= table_.size()) {
00818                         
00819                         // find the port for the index
00820                         BusPortsModel::Port temp = table_.at(index.row());
00821 
00822                         // if port is not yet added to the list
00823                         if (!ports.contains(temp))
00824                                 ports.append(temp);
00825                 }
00826         }
00827 
00828         beginResetModel();
00829 
00830         foreach (BusPortsModel::Port port, ports) {
00831                 if (table_.contains(port)) {
00832                         int index = table_.indexOf(port);
00833                         table_.removeAt(index);
00834                 }
00835         }
00836 
00837         endResetModel();
00838 
00839         emit contentChanged();
00840 }
00841 
00842 void BusPortsModel::copyIndexes( const QModelIndexList& indexes ) {
00843         QList<BusPortsModel::Port> ports;
00844 
00845         // find all ports that match given indexes
00846         foreach (QModelIndex index, indexes) {
00847 
00848                 if (index.row() >= 0 && index.row() <= table_.size()) {
00849 
00850                         // find the port for the index
00851                         BusPortsModel::Port temp = table_.at(index.row());
00852 
00853                         // if port is not yet added to the list
00854                         if (!ports.contains(temp))
00855                                 ports.append(temp);
00856                 }
00857         }
00858 
00859         beginResetModel();
00860 
00861         // make copy of each port
00862         foreach (BusPortsModel::Port port, ports) {
00863                 
00864                 // create a copy of the port and change the name to contain "-copy"
00865                 BusPortsModel::Port copyPort = port;
00866                 copyPort.name_ += QString("-copy");
00867 
00868                 table_.append(copyPort);
00869         }
00870 
00871         // sort the table to keep ports in order
00872         qSort(table_);
00873 
00874         endResetModel();
00875 
00876         emit contentChanged();
00877 }
00878 
00879 void BusPortsModel::exportCSV( const QString& path ) {
00880 
00881         if (path.isEmpty())
00882                 return;
00883 
00884         QFile file(path);
00885          
00886         // if file can't be opened then quit
00887         if (!file.open(QFile::Truncate | QFile::WriteOnly)) {
00888                 emit errorMessage(tr("Could not open file %1 for writing.").arg(path));
00889                 return;
00890         }
00891 
00892         QTextStream stream(&file);
00893 
00894         // write the headers for the columns
00895         stream << "Name;Qualifier;Width;Default;Mode;Direction;Presence;Driver;Comment" << endl;
00896 
00897         // write each port
00898         foreach (BusPortsModel::Port port, table_) {
00899                 stream << port.name_ << ";";
00900                 stream << portQualifier2Str(port.qualifier_) << ";";
00901                 stream << port.width_ << ";";
00902                 stream << port.defaultValue_ << ";";
00903                 stream << portMode2Str(port.mode_) << ";";
00904                 stream << portDirection2Str(port.direction_) << ";";
00905                 stream << General::presence2Str(port.presence_) << ";";
00906                 stream << portDriver2Str(port.driver_) << ";";
00907                 stream << port.comment_ << endl;
00908         }
00909 
00910         // close the file
00911         file.close();
00912 }
00913 
00914 void BusPortsModel::importCSV( const QString& path ) {
00915 
00916         if (path.isEmpty())
00917                 return;
00918 
00919         // make sure the path exists and it is to a file, not a directory
00920         QFileInfo info(path);
00921         if (!info.exists() || !info.isFile())
00922                 return;
00923 
00924         QFile file(path);
00925 
00926         // if file can't be opened for reading
00927         if (!file.open(QFile::Truncate | QFile::ReadOnly)) {
00928                 emit errorMessage(tr("Could not open file %1 for reading.").arg(path));
00929                 return;
00930         }
00931 
00932         QTextStream stream(&file);
00933 
00934         // read the headers from the stream and make sure the file is of correct format
00935         QString header = stream.readLine(100);
00936         QStringList headers = header.split(";", QString::KeepEmptyParts);
00937         if (headers.size() != 9) {
00938                 emit errorMessage(tr("File %1 was not appropriate format to import ports.").arg(
00939                         path));
00940                 file.close();
00941                 return;
00942         }
00943 
00944         beginResetModel();
00945 
00946         // read all lines
00947         while (!stream.atEnd()) {
00948 
00949                 QString line = stream.readLine(0);
00950                 QStringList settings = line.split(";", QString::KeepEmptyParts);
00951                 // if not all settings are found then skip port
00952                 if (settings.size() != 9) {
00953                         emit noticeMessage(tr("Found invalid port within csv-file import, skipping..."));
00954                         continue;
00955                 }
00956 
00957                 // create port with a name
00958                 BusPortsModel::Port port(settings.at(0));
00959 
00960                 // set the qualifier
00961                 port.qualifier_ = str2PortQualifier(settings.at(1));
00962 
00963                 // set width
00964                 port.width_ = settings.at(2).toInt();
00965 
00966                 // set default value
00967                 port.defaultValue_ = settings.at(3);
00968 
00969                 // set mode
00970                 port.mode_ = str2PortMode(settings.at(4));
00971 
00972                 // set direction
00973                 port.direction_ = str2PortDirection(settings.at(5));
00974 
00975                 // set presence
00976                 port.presence_ = General::str2Presence(settings.at(6), General::REQUIRED);
00977 
00978                 // set the driver
00979                 port.driver_ = str2PortDriver(settings.at(7));
00980 
00981                 // set the comment
00982                 port.comment_ = settings.at(8);
00983 
00984                 // before adding port make sure it does not already exist
00985                 if (!table_.contains(port))
00986                         table_.append(port);
00987         }
00988 
00989         // last sort the table
00990         qSort(table_);
00991 
00992         endResetModel();
00993         
00994         // close the file
00995         file.close();
00996 
00997         emit contentChanged();
00998 }

01038

01040                 qualifier_ = other.qualifier_;
01041                 width_ = other.width_;
01042                 defaultValue_ = other.defaultValue_;
01043                 mode_ = other.mode_;
01044                 direction_ = other.direction_;

01048         }

01051 
01052 bool BusPortsModel::Port::operator==( const Port& other ) const {
01053         
01054         // if names don't match
01055         if (name_ != other.name_)
01056                 return false;
01057         
01058         // if either port has mode ANY and the names matched
01059         else if (mode_ == BusPortsModel::MODE_ANY || other.mode_ == BusPortsModel::MODE_ANY)
01060                 return true;
01061 
01062         // if modes don't match and 
01063         else if (mode_ != other.mode_)
01064                 return false;
01065 
01066         // if names matched and ports matched
01067         else
01068                 return true;
01069 }
01070 
01071 bool BusPortsModel::Port::operator!=( const Port& other ) const {
01072 
01073         // if names don't match
01074         if (name_ != other.name_)
01075                 return true;
01076 
01077         // if either port has mode ANY and the names matched
01078         else if (mode_ == BusPortsModel::MODE_ANY || other.mode_ == BusPortsModel::MODE_ANY)
01079                 return false;
01080 
01081         // if modes don't match and 
01082         else if (mode_ != other.mode_)
01083                 return true;
01084 
01085         // if names matched and ports matched
01086         else
01087                 return false;
01088 }
01089 
01090 bool BusPortsModel::Port::operator<( const Port& other ) const {
01091 
01092         // if names match then order by mode
01093         if (name_ == other.name_) {
01094                 return mode_ < other.mode_;
01095         }
01096         else
01097                 return name_ < other.name_;
01098 }
